channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3223] Availability Info: Labels need to be maintainable per country
item.description:
The availability status (label and green/yellow/orange icon) depends on the stock level in the primary and secondary warehouses.

However the labels should be different by country, as e.g. an availability in the secondary warehouse leads to a label of "48 h" in CH, but "< 10 d" in AT.

SOLUTION

  • Labels for the availability info must be maintainable in site-specific property
  • as per Adi: /environment/common/hybris/config/local.properties, similar to payment settings
  • This concerns:
    • Availability labels on all product lists (including search, favorite, shopping, compare)
    • Availability label on product detail page
    • And also: The availability information within the info layer on the product detail page

Values for AT:
Status Info
green => "24 h"
light green => "< 10 d"
yellow => "> 10 d"
orange => "> 10 d"

Stock Level Info
"24 h"
"< 10 d"
"> 10 d (<date>)"
"> 10 d"

Values for CH:
Status Info
green => "24 h"
light green => "48 h"
yellow => "> 48 h"
orange => "> 48 h"

Stock Level Info
"24 h"
"48 h"
"> 48 h (<date>)"
"> 48 h"

Values for IT:

  • To be defined!
item.summary: Availability Info: Labels need to be maintainable per country

comments.comment: Labels are now loaded from local.properties and brought to frontend within the ajax call and then added to the content same as availability values.
Ticket is from frontend perspective done. There is one remaining issue that the label for backorder does not seem to be delivered to the frontend. Dishan is looking at it.
I have fixed by calling the correct method.
Done!

Florian,
please test the labels after the next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3139] missing purchaser name on orders - if admin has 2 sub-users he does not know who bought what...
item.description:
When admin has to approve an order he gets the info who is requesting the approval. See attachment 01
But after at orders level, admin does not have this info anymore.
See attachments 02 and 03
item.summary: missing purchaser name on orders - if admin has 2 sub-users he does not know who bought what...

comments.comment:
Raphael,
If an order is approved by the admin, is the "orderer" on the order object the admin, or is it the user who asked for approval?
As discussed, please add the the information "Ordered by" to the order history overview and the order history detail view, if the user logged in is a B2B admin.

attachment.name: 01 -Bestellgenehmigung - info from requester is there OK.jpg
attachment.author: jlebec

attachment.name: 02 - Bestellverlauf - info about the purchaser (sub-user) missing.jpg
attachment.author: jlebec

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3238] PIM-Import: Product-Hashes are persited regardless of unsaved Product-References
item.description: Product-Hashes should not be persited before all related ProductReferences are created. Otherwise such references won't ever be created when a PIM-Import is aborted.
item.summary: PIM-Import: Product-Hashes are persited regardless of unsaved Product-References

comments.comment: Issue fixed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3318] Create site-specific property files for Orderconfirmation PDF
item.description: At the moment the Orderconfirmation PDF has just language specific property files. We need them to be language and site specific to able to define different Distrelec Addresses for each site.
item.summary: Create site-specific property files for Orderconfirmation PDF

comments.comment: Done!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3303] Cathegory pages, tough created in the CH catalogue, they are published on the AT catalogues as well
item.description:
I created 2 Cathegory Pages into CH Staged catalogues, in P.

I syncronized the catalogue.

The page appears on AT, P
item.summary: Cathegory pages, tough created in the CH catalogue, they are published on the AT catalogues as well

comments.comment: Oana, what are the names of the pages in the cms cockpit?

had a look at it - for the page "passive bauelemente" it currently looks as follows:

CH
http://prod.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com/de/Komponenten/Passive-Bauelemente/c/cat-L2D_379525
-> correctly showing with the text, as defined on manual category page with page restriction

AT
http://www.distrelec.at/de/Komponenten/Passive-Bauelemente/c/cat-L2D_379525
-> correctly showing without the text (there is no manual category page in the AT catalog at the moment)

So at the moment it all appears to be well.
Oana, have you edited the page or restriction after creating this ticket? If yes what has changed? Was maybe the restriction defined on the category from a wrong catalog?

Distrelec Content Catalog CH >> Staged >> CategoryPage - Aktive Bauelemente - DIS-S


Distrelec Content Catalog CH >> Staged >> CategoryPage - Passive Bauelemente - DIS-S

Ok - so again: it is looking fine at the moment, the text appears on the CH page but not on the AT page, as it is maintained in the CMS.
I don't know if something was changed to the configuration between the time the screenshot was taken and the time of analysis, but at the moment it seems to be working fine.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3295] Manage Catalog Plus images
item.description:
According with Florian only one image should be imported with product import.
The image will be shown in the product detail page, and so must be imported in hybris in "portrait_medium" format.
In the frontend page all the other images (thumbnails and landscape_large) will be hidden in case of catalog plus product.
item.summary: Manage Catalog Plus images

comments.comment: in green the components that must be hidden in case of catplus product.
small correction: the thumbnail should stay.
Duplicate of ticket DISTRELEC-3294. Fixed on the other ticket.

I think the workflow action code is missing.

I can only find a method with following mapping
/order-approval-requests/order-details/{orderCode:.*}/workflow/{workflowActionCode:.*}

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3280] B2E - Order confirmation Mail not received
item.description:
Hi Nabil,

The order confirmation-email is not sent to the address entered during checkout. Maybe it is sent to the address of the account owner. Please check.

Thanks.
item.summary: B2E - Order confirmation Mail not received

comments.comment: Any update?

Hi,

The problem that we are facing for this particular case is that the email will be sent to the customer email and not the one registered during the checkout phase. The email sending process is handled asynchronously when the checkout is complete. However, I have no control on the email process.

Please ask someone from namics who is responsible for the email process. thanks.

Hi Nando,

Can you assign this ticket so someone who is capable of changing the email process at checkout. Thanks.

Dishan will look at it.

Rafael, is there a test account that he can use?

account: distrelec.testing.b2e@gmail.com
pw: distrelec
Fixed!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3277] CMS Cockpit: Navigation Node needs to long to be shown on shop
item.description:
when you create a navigation node in the footer, it tries over 5min until you can see the result. (attached files)

also the nodes they are created, are not showing on the shop as they are in the footer navigation. (attached files)
item.summary: CMS Cockpit: Navigation Node needs to long to be shown on shop

comments.comment:
Sorry Kris but I don't understand yet what the issue is:
- what exactly takes 5 minutes - syncing of the catalogs?
- As for the nodes: Pleasae provide information regarding the system (atos or HP) and site used (ch, at, it).

Thanks

Hallo Nando

Es dauert 5min nachdem du einen Node erstellt hast, bis es im Test System erscheint.
Dann entsprechen die Nodes nicht dem was im CMS Cockpit angelegt wurde mit der Testumgebung. Dazu die 2 Attachements

Die Kisten sind bei Atos soviel ich weiss. Die Seite war Staged CH. Vielen Dank.

Kris,

the situation is the following:
- It does indeed take several minutes. This is not really a bug but just an unfortunate behavior of the system, as the footer navigation is being cached on the server side per session. If you test in a different browser or in an inkognito tab or delete the cookies,< you should see it fairly quickly.
- The fact that some of the nodes are not showing in the footer is due to missing Title within the nodes, see screenshot. If you add Titles in all needed languages, they will appear.

thanks nando

yes, the second thing i forgot. my fault! sry..
thnx for this great support!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3274] footer.copyright.label
item.description:
Hi!

Though the correct texts were inserted in the HMC, on the respective pages, the labels were not updated.

Thank you in advance for looking at this!
item.summary: footer.copyright.label

comments.comment:
Hi,

The property is called "ch.footer.copyright.label" (which was missing BTW ) not "footer.copyright.label".

Hi,

I will merge the base.properties files with the hmc message entries to get the latest ones.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3272] French and Italian Translations from the HMC, at Atos test
item.description:
Situation is the folowing:

  • Nabil imported the existing translation in Italian and French
  • all translations are in the HMC
  • on the test enviorment , nothing is shown unless
  • the labeles are searched in the HMC
  • edited, modified, saved
  • edited, delete the modification, saved

Example:

on page: https://test.a.distrelec.ch/register/b2c

Password Strength is in English

In HMC, this is translated.

If

  • edited, modified, saved
  • edited, delete the modification, saved

these words will be modified, and the translation will be in place.

Please fix asap this error, as we need to proofread!!!
item.summary: French and Italian Translations from the HMC, at Atos test

comments.comment: Could you please check this?
Pascal, according to Florian, there is a definition problem in the hMC. Please can you look at this?

it's a caching issue of the spring message properties. the values are loaded to memory at the time they were english.

reboot of the server will help.
Please reboot

Hi,

The problem does not come from the cache because if we switch to german we wont have this problem. The problem is only with french (on the swiss website).

BTW, I rebooted the nodes but the problem remains.
There was a synchronization problem. I've deleted all online MessageResourceTableEntry for CH and run the sync job again. shoud be fixed now.
Nabil, please verify
I've tested the french Locale and it seems to work now.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3242] Remove tracking pixels, adapt Ensighten script
item.description:
1) Remove tracking pixels
Due the pixel integration into the Ensighten TMS we can remove the following hard coded tracking pixels: see attached file

2) Adapt Ensighten Script to be different per site (country), and generic in Test system
General: We should maybe keep it for all websites, could give us additional edge in the future…
<script src="//nexus.ensighten.com/distrelec/Bootstrap.js"></script>

Locals:
Distrelec AT
<script src="//nexus.ensighten.com/distrelecAT/Bootstrap.js"></script>

Distrelec CH
<script src="//nexus.ensighten.com/distrelecCH/Bootstrap.js"></script>

Distrelec IT
<script src="//nexus.ensighten.com/distrelecIT/Bootstrap.js"></script>

Test and Dev systems:
<script src="//nexus.ensighten.com/distrelec/dev/Bootstrap.js"></script>
item.summary: Remove tracking pixels, adapt Ensighten script

comments.comment:
To Summarize, I will remove the following tracking pixels:

- Affilinet Conversion Tracking
- IntelliAd Conversion Tracking
- Google Analytics
- Google Analytics Ecommerce Tracking
- Google Adwords Smart Pixel
- Google Adwords Conversion Tracking

That Leaves us with the following tracking pixels:

- IntelliAd Cart
- IntelliAd Newsletter
- IntelliAd Registration

Do we keep these pixels or do I also need to remove these?
you can remove them too, they were on the excel file in its column.
I Removed all tracking pixels and added the nexus ensighten script links as provided.
task done

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3221] Prevent channel switch for logged-in users
item.description:
A login is always bound to a channel / customer type (either B2B or B2C).

If a B2B user tries to log in in while being in the B2C channel, the channel is automatically switched.

HOWEVER:
After login it is possible for the user to switch the channel.

SOLUTION:

  • Disable the channel dropdown in the site settings lightbox for logged-in users
  • Assure that is is not possible to switch the channel in cases where the URL contains the channel information
item.summary: Prevent channel switch for logged-in users

comments.comment: A logged-in user cannot switch channel anymore - not even using an URL parameter (?channel=xxx see DISTRELEC-3237)
Florian, can you please retest this after the monday deployment?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3080] Copy Email Templates from AT for CH/IT
item.description: die Email Templates von AT übernehmen für CH und die anderen Länder
item.summary: Copy Email Templates from AT for CH/IT

comments.comment:
1. Suche hardcoded string in email templates (distrelecContentCatalog/emails) und mit ctx.messages ersetzen (für AT)
2. Ask Lukas if messages are country specific and if other languages than De can be deleted in i.e. AT
3. Copy messages files to CH and IT, translate IT

For questions, ask Lukas Stucker (skype: lukas.stuker).


/// Update Template via HAC Impec import. Ask Pascal Nüesch for BE Support.


# Import the CMS content for the Distrelec site emails
#
# Localization de
#
$contentMasterCatalog=distrelecContentCatalog
$contentCatalog=distrelec_ATContentCatalog
$contentCV=catalogVersion(CatalogVersion.catalog(Catalog.id[default=$contentCatalog]),CatalogVersion.version[default=Staged])[default=$contentCatalog:Staged]
$emailResource=jar:com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.setup.CoreSystemSetup&/distrelecB2Bcore/import/project/contentCatalogs/$contentMasterCatalog/emails
$cmsSiteUID=distrelec_AT

# Language
$lang=de

# Email velocity templates
INSERT_UPDATE RendererTemplate;code[unique=true];description[lang=$lang];templateScript[lang=$lang,translator=de.hybris.platform.commerceservices.impex.impl.FileLoaderValueTranslator];rendererType(code)[default='velocity']
 ;$cmsSiteUID-Email_Order_Confirmation_Body;Body-E-Mail Bestellbestätigung;$emailResource/email-orderConfirmationBody.vm;


Für Send to Friend die letzte Zeile ersetzen mit:

;$cmsSiteUID-Email_Send_To_Friend_Body;E-Mail an Freund schicken;$emailResource/email-sendToFriendBody.vm;

Following Work is done:

1. Replaced all hardcoded Texts with message properties
2. Removed Macro for Availability Status since it is new country specific and comes from the backend (DISTRELEC-3223)
3. Checked all Message Properties Files and completed some missing properties
4. Deleted footer and header languagefiles for languages which are not supported for each shop (eg. FR for Austria Shop)

TODO:

Please check all message properties files and add the translations for EN/FR/IT Languages. You can find the files here

/distrelecB2Bcore/resources/distrelecB2Bcore/messages

Hi Nabil,

As Per Nando, you are responsible for the message translations. Could you please take care of the missing translations for the email message properties?
Thank you. Jan

Hi Jan,

Have you already updated the *email*.properties files?

Hi Nabil,

Email properties files are updated on trunk and all message properties are in there. ready for translation.
I already copied the files to Atos Q system on all nodes. I also re-imported the email impex files for different sales orgs

Hi Nabil

You assigned this task to me. Is there any Frontend work to do?
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3073] Newsletter Backend: Change Salutation
item.description:
Distrelec requests, that the Anrede is not like this

Sehr geehrte(r) Herr

but

Sehr geehrter Herr / Sehr geehrte Frau

The Implementation right now looks like this: salutation=Sehr geehrte(r) {0} {1}

If this change is not possible, assign to Patrick Frei!
item.summary: Newsletter Backend: Change Salutation

comments.comment: Pascal, idealerweise würden wir die Anrede geschlechtsspezifisch machen. Also: Sehr geehrte (wenn es sich um eine Frau handelt) und Sehr geehrter (wenn es sich um einen Herrn Handelt). Kann aber nicht Match entscheidend sein.

Und was machen wir mit der möglichen Anrede "Herr und Frau"?! Statt jetzt einen Schnellschuss zu implementieren würde ich darauf tendieren, das Ganze mal sorgfältig anzuschauen und eine Lösung zu suchen die dann für die gesamte Platform auch für Englisch, Französisch etc. und eventuellen weiteren Titeln wie Doktor usw. zurechtkommt. Aus meiner Sicht nicht gerechtfertigt für Priorität Major oder was darüber ist.
Ok, I can follow your argument. Let's do as suggested by Dominic. This should be possible risk free.
I did not suggest anything, just created the ticket with the requirement as described in your first comment.
suggest means "as written in description by Dominic"
Nando, we need a better requirement of all the cases we need to cover, ideally for all countries or at least for AT/CH/IT and ideally also ELFA.

Adrian,
the current salutation codes are as per new SAP, is that correct? Can you give an assessment of this status, is it likely that the number of possible salutations will increase?

This is the list of currently available "titles" from SAP:
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+Title
Regarding Evangelos, the list is very, very static. Changes are not likely.

Possible solution: Add a localized String attribute "mailSalutation" to the Title object. Implement a service that returns the salutation based on given customer.

- title="Mr."
-- mailSalutation[de]="Sehr geehrter Herr {}"
-- mailSalutation[en]="Dear Mr {}"

- title="Mr. and Mrs."
-- mailSalutation[de]="Sehr geehrte Frau / sehr geehrter Herr {}"
-- mailSalutation[en]="Dear Mr and Ms {}"

Hence, the logic to build the salutation string is centralized and not spreaded over all the mail templates.

Florian,
please confirm whether the approach suggested by Adrian is ok.

I agree.
We should build it based on SAP.

added attribute mailSalutationTemplate to Title Object

e.g.
- title="Mr."
-- mailSalutationTemplate[de]="Sehr geehrter Herr {lastname}"
-- mailSalutationTemplate[en]="Dear Mister {lastname}"
 

Dishan: please populate the replaced value to following mail templates:
- email-customerRegistrationBody.vm
- email-deactivateUserBody.vm
- email-forgottenPasswordBody.vm
- email-orderApprovalRejectionBody.vm
- email-orderConfirmationBody.vm
- email-orderPendingApprovalBody.vm
- email-setInitialPasswordBody.vm
Done!
created related task for the the translation of the salutations DISTRELEC-3306

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3058] Editing customer 16 Billing adress possible
item.description: Customer 16 is not allow to change his billing adress. If you chose "Ship my order to a different address" Shipping adress appears. Posible to edit. If you edit you edit the billing adress same time
item.summary: Editing customer 16 Billing adress possible

comments.comment:
Had a look at it:
- It appears that the address displayed as "billing address" in the checkout is actually NOT the billing address, but one of the shippping addresses. See AddressCheckout.png
- In the address section of MyAccount, the same address appears under shipping addresses (see AddressMyAcount2.png), and the billing address is a different one (see AddressMyAccount1)
@Oliver: Did you change address properties or default addresses through the hmc?
@Dishan. I have no access to the hmc. I made the changes directly in the shop

This problemm occurs because of a database inconstancy. The billing address you see in the checkout is defined as default billing address on the company, but it actually isn't (billing-flag isn't set). Therefore somebody must have manually changed it through the hmc. Since this customer is already pretty old, please try it with a new customer.
I tested this issue also with customer distrelec.testing+17-0000@gmail.com and still couldn't reproduce it.

attachment.name: Distrelec CH Site - Windows Internet Explorer_2014-02-04_12-08-29.jpg
attachment.author: osautter

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3041] Save login information doesn't work
item.description:
-Click on meta-nav myAccount
-Click on login without any information
->Login page opens
-Fill out all information an login
->You will be logged in
-Logout
-Click on meta-nav myAccount
-Try to login with stored informations

-> no stored information available

Win7/IE9
all customers
item.summary: Save login information doesn't work

comments.comment:
Mark,
I'm sorry I don't understand the issue: What kind of stored information would you expect?
- did you also check the "remember me" checkbox before login?
- or did you use some browser functionality that should have saved the username/password?
- or something different?

I expect, that the username and password will be set automatically next time I login.
Checked, the remember me" and the browser hasn't asked me to store the information...
Reviewed also the settings for the IE browser and enabled the option to save usernames and passwords.

This is not a bug.

- The "remember me" checkbox has the effect, that the user is not logged after the session times out. So if you come back to the site after a few days, you should still be logged in.
- If you wish for the login fields to be pre-fillet: this is a browser-specific functionality and has nothing to do with the website.

Resolving this issue.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2876] Proxy Issue search request
item.description:
Browser: Chrome 32

Proxy Error appears during search request "001428".
item.summary: Proxy Issue search request

comments.comment:
Could not reproduce.
But either way is there a possibly know source for such a problem, and is there possibly the need for action?

How long did it take until this error message appeared?

Normally this message is displayed when:
- no backend system is available (during deployments, ...)
- the backend doesn't respond within the defined timeout (which is 5 minutes at the moment)
Took less than 5' according to Florian. (It took a while, maybe 1')

I don't know the source of the problem.

And since we can not reproduce the bug, there is nothing I can do!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2820] How can the default langauge of a user change
item.description:
The default language setting for distrelec.testing+1@gmail.com had changed for some reason from DE to FR.

Is there a case in which a language could change by a user action?
item.summary: How can the default langauge of a user change

comments.comment:
For anonymous users a cookie value defines the language to be used.
If a user is logged in, the language is also stored at the user in the hybris database. This value will be used the next time the user logs in.

A test could look like this:
- Log in as user X. Change language to FR (not possible in AT but CH).
- Logout.
- Change language to EN (used for anonymous)
- Close / reopen browser => EN should be used.
- Login as user X => FR will be used.

To change back to DE, simply change lang when logged in.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2607] Facets error
item.description:
OS: OS X, 10.8.5
Browser: Firefox, 26.0

On homepage, click on "Components", then "Aktive Bauelemente", "Analoge Schaltungen". On this category page level 3, I have choosed in facet the category "Verstärker", then "Operationsverstärker". After that I have set a filter to the price between CHF 975 to CHF 2716.
First I was able to choose in the facets an attribute which is not available at the two articles which the search was found, the attribute "Zwei Versorgungsspannungen" chhosable at the end of the facet into "Add additional filter". When I have choose this, an error windows appears which told me "The facet could not be retrieved!".
Second if I click in the error window, but not on the OK button, the window will close also like I have clicked on OK button. (img_273-275_pzu)

Cornel,
is this still a known issue with the additional facets or is this a different / new bug?
I think this tickets relates to the same issue mentioned in DISTRELEC-2333.

comments.comment: I added a special category in PIM for that and will start the export. As I'm not 100% sure on how the shop will handle it being missing in the megaflyout I'll link this issue to the PIM End-to-End testing.
I unfortunately forgot to generate an 8 digit artno. I'll did it and will restart the export sometime today.

- The correct articles are now suppressed / not suppressed
- Next successful PIM export/import should contain artno 990100 and 990101

Won't appear as long as 8 digits artno is missing in Movex for those articles. Issue is in progress. Then this issue could be closed. Depends on DISTRELEC-2805 Products in Hybris with missing 8-Digit Article Number

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2152] sub-user creation - 2 issues : allowed permissions 3 times info, Approval budget : order limit > yearly limit
item.description:
TS-24.21
Sub-user creation.
1) a weird label - 3 times info. See TS-24_21_user_creation_allowed_permissions_info3times
2) Approval budget per order > the one per year. See TS-24_21_user_creation_approval_amounts
item.summary: sub-user creation - 2 issues : allowed permissions 3 times info, Approval budget : order limit > yearly limit

comments.comment:
Jean,
which user, which sub-user was it?
Nando, please can you retest the approval workflow and if this is not reproducible, close it.
as to 2): there is no requirement that the order budget cannot be higher than the yearly budget. responsibility of the admin to set the budgets reasonably.

As to 1):
Jan, where does the "info info info" below the permissions radio boxes come from, is this a property?

Nando, since I did not do the myaccount part, I can only guess. It is a Property loaded from the message file which could be filled with any kind of text. In the attached Screenshot you can see that there is some kind of information Text below the permissions checkboxes. Should I leave it in there or take it out. If we leave it there, Distrelec would need to replace it with the desired Text.

Oana,
the "info info info" text in the permissions section of the user management in my account is a property that needs to be maintained (property name: userdetailform.allowedPermissions.requestQuotationsInfo)

Please align with the translation team.
JW, please check. It should be fixed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-1637] What should happen if somehow an error occurs, while adding product to cart?
item.description:
For an example if there is no price for a product, currently the "Internal Server Error" is shown. And the product is in the cart (which you can see after a page reload). How should we handle this case?
Suggestion: We handle it like a punchout, and remove it from the cart, telling customer that this product is temporary not buyable.
item.summary: What should happen if somehow an error occurs, while adding product to cart?

comments.comment:
I would agree... the cart should only contain items that will not break the checkout process (or prevent the cart itself from working properly).
René, would you say this is the way to go or do you have a different proposal?

Yes I agree!

The question is, if we use the same message?
I would recommend to use different message, so we can differentiate why the product could not be added to the cart.
Could this ticket be closed? Thanks!
If a error occurs during add to cart, the defined message is shown and the product is removed from the cart.
I think this is done already
